name: Down Below (Jaskowicz, llukee, VIPYeetus, Max, Carl890)
name_original: Down Below (Jaskowicz, llukee, VIPYeetus, Max, Carl890)
description:
Sarge here, we've got a mission for you. Your brothers went on a mission into a cave and haven't returned yet. Your mission is to go in that cave, find your brothers, clear it out, and get back out in time! If you don't, you'll be fired. Oh, and you'll be dead but management doesn't cover that.

------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Mouse - Camera Movement

R - Reload

LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Shoot

E - Interact

------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Programming & Level Designer: Archie Jaskowicz

Game Designer & Voice Acting: Max Breeze

3D Modeller: Carl Hodgson

UI Designer & Art: Luke Craven & Marcus Brown

Sound Effects: freesound.org and Unreal Engine.

Font: Rajdhandi - Google Fonts

Outside Desert HDR: PolyHaven.com (goegap)

------------------------------------------------------

Known Issue(s):

- The lava doesn't kill you

------------------------------------------------------
